instruction: Describe a difficult situation that you have faced and how you worked to overcome it.
output: I recently graduated from college and was struggling to find a job. I applied to multiple positions, but due to the stiff competition, I was not successful. To tackle this problem, I reached out to my network and asked for advice about the positions I had applied for. I also attended career events to get more information on the positions I was applying for. After putting in the extra effort, I was able to secure a job.
